title: Drawing, "Written Characters, Textile Design (black, blue and pink)", 1950–70
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on paper, lined.
description: Grid pattern on black background of blue squares imprinted with pink characters.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Written Characters, Textile Design (black, blue and pink)", 1950–70.
1950–70. Brush and gouache, graphite on paper, lined.. Gift of Mr. Donald Cameron. 1992-51-76.
